column3: Effective December 31, 2017, the Corporation revised its accounting policy election related to sales-based taxes. See Note 2: Accounting Changes.
Sales and other operating revenue excludes previously reported sales-based taxes of $17,980 million for 2016 and $19,634 million for 2015. See Note 2: Accounting Changes.
The earnings per common share and earnings per common share - assuming dilution are the same in each period shown.
